revised_title: Generalized Coupled Wave Theory for Volume Diffraction in Two Dimensions
tldr: The authors present a generalized coupled wave theory for scalar volume diffraction in two dimensions, allowing for the simulation of volume holographic recording of complicated object beams and the reconstruction of their images. This theory avoids the restrictions of existing theories and permits gratings of general form, including the consideration of Fresnel diffraction, spurious diffracted waves, and higher-order diffraction.
